meanings.definition: A flat, rectangular case for carrying papers or books.
meanings.sent1: He always carries his important papers in his briefcase.
meanings.sent2: She grabbed her briefcase before heading to the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The briefcase looked like a mini suitcase for papers.
meanings.sent4: Her briefcase was a treasure chest of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The briefcase held the secrets of his work.

meanings.definition: A portable, rectangular case for carrying documents or personal items.
meanings.sent1: He packed his laptop in his briefcase for the trip.
meanings.sent2: She used her briefcase to carry her makeup and wallet.
meanings.sent3: The briefcase was like a magic bag that held everything she needed.
meanings.sent4: His briefcase was a portable office on the go.
meanings.sent5: The briefcase was a trusty companion on his travels.
